SELECT A.INTPD_REGNO /*관심상품 등록번호*/ , A.PD_CODE /*제품코드*/ , CASE WHEN OPTION2_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN B.PD_NAME || ' (' || OPTION1_NAME || ':' || OPTION1_VALUE || ' ' || OPTION2_NAME || ':' || OPTION2_VALUE || ')' WHEN OPTION1_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN B.PD_NAME || ' (' || OPTION1_NAME || ':' || OPTION1_VALUE || ')' ELSE B.PD_NAME END PD_NAME , A.PD_QTY /*제품 수량*/
, CASE WHEN OPTION2_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT TMP.PRICE FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDOPTION TMP WHERE TMP.PD_CODE = A.PD_CODE AND TMP.OPTION_NAME = A.OPTION2_NAME AND TMP.OPTION_VALUE = A.OPTION2_VALUE AND TMP.UP_NAME = A.OPTION1_NAME AND TMP.UP_VALUE = A.OPTION1_VALUE) WHEN OPTION1_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT TMP.PRICE FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDOPTION TMP WHERE TMP.PD_CODE = A.PD_CODE AND TMP.OPTION_NAME = A.OPTION1_NAME AND TMP.OPTION_VALUE = A.OPTION1_VALUE) ELSE A.PD_PRICE END REAL_PRICE , B.ATFL_ID /*파일ID*/ , B.RPIMG_SEQ /*대표이미지 순번*/ , B.SALE_CON /*판매상태*/ , B.DEL_YN , (SELECT CUT_UNIT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDCUTXM WHERE PD_CODE = A.PD_CODE AND SEQ = A.PD_CUT_SEQ ) PD_CUT_SEQ , NVL ( (SELECT COMDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_COMCODXD WHERE COMM_CODE = 'OPTION_GUBN' AND COMD_CODE = A.OPTION_CODE ), (SELECT OPTDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_OPTCODXD M, POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM N WHERE M.OPTD_CODE = A.OPTION_CODE AND N.PD_CODE = A.PD_CODE AND M.OPTM_CODE = N.OPTION_GUBN) ) AS OPTION_CODE , C.STFL_PATH , C.STFL_NAME , C.FILEPATH_FLAG , OPTION1_NAME , OPTION1_VALUE , OPTION2_NAME , OPTION2_VALUE FROM POLARBEAR.TB_IPINFOXM A/*관심상품*/ INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM B /*상품정보*/ ON A.PD_CODE = B.PD_CODE LEFT JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_COATFLXD C /*첨부파일정보*/ ON B.ATFL_ID = C.ATFL_ID AND B.RPIMG_SEQ = C.ATFL_SEQ WHERE A.MEMB_ID = #{REGP_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POLARBEAR.TB_BKINFOXM /*장바구니*/ (BSKT_REGNO, PD_CODE, BSKT_REGDT, MEMB_ID, PD_NAME, PD_QTY, PD_PRICE, PDDC_GUBN, PDDC_VAL, OCCUR_SVMN, REGP_ID, REG_DTM, MODP_ID, MOD_DTM, PD_CUT_SEQ, OPTION_CODE, OPTION1_NAME, OPTION1_VALUE, OPTION2_NAME, OPTION2_VALUE ) SELECT ((SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(BSKT_REGNO))+1,1) FROM POLARBEAR.TB_BKINFOXM)), PD_CODE, SYSDATE, MEMB_ID, PD_NAME, PD_QTY, PD_PRICE, PDDC_GUBN, PDDC_VAL, OCCUR_SVMN, REGP_ID, REG_DTM, MODP_ID, MOD_DTM, PD_CUT_SEQ, OPTION_CODE, OPTION1_NAME, OPTION1_VALUE, OPTION2_NAME, OPTION2_VALUE FROM POLARBEAR.TB_IPINFOXM /*관심상품*/ WHERE INTPD_REGNO = #{INTPD_REGNO}
